Services & Pricing

Professional, eco-friendly lawn care services in Denver. All equipment is electric by design - quiet, emission-free, and reliable.

Lawn Mowing Pricing

Season Pass

Save 25%

Two payments cover 14 bi-weekly visits (every 2 weeks, April–October, ~28 weeks). Additional cuts at your discounted rate (25% off).

14 bi-weekly visits included
25% discount on all visits
Additional cuts at discounted rate
Lock in your rate for the season

Standard cost for most Denver lawns: ~$300-350 per payment (2 payments)

Pay Per Visit

Pay only for each visit. Bi-weekly schedule: 14 visits per season (April–October, ~28 weeks).

Flexible scheduling
No commitment required
Pay as you go

Standard cost for most Denver lawns: ~$50-60 per visit

We'll contact you with specific pricing based on your property size and needs. The costs above represent standard pricing for most Denver lawns. Final pricing will be provided after we review your address.

Payment Options

All payments can be made digitally or collected at the time of service. Payments are considered late 24 hours after service completion.

Our Services

Weekly & Bi-Weekly Lawn Mowing

Professional mowing service with quiet, battery-powered electric mowers. We trim edges, blow clippings, and keep your property spotless - all while reducing noise and emissions in your neighborhood.

Spring Cleanup & Aeration

Thorough cleanup, dethatching, core aeration, and overseeding to get your lawn ready for the growing season. All equipment is electric, keeping your neighborhood quiet and clean.

Snow Removal Service

Professional snow removal for driveways, walkways, and sidewalks using electric equipment. Available now for winter service - quiet, emission-free, and reliable.

Pricing based on driveway length and property size

Fall Cleanup & Winter Prep

Clear leaves and debris, apply winter fertilizer, and prepare your lawn for the cold months ahead. All done with electric equipment to minimize noise and emissions.

Additional Services

Spring Cleanup & Aeration

Comprehensive cleanup, dethatching, core aeration, and overseeding. Pricing varies by lawn size.

Standard cost for most Denver lawns: ~$150-200

Fall Cleanup & Winter Prep

Leaf removal, winter fertilization, and lawn preparation. Pricing varies by lawn size.

Standard cost for most Denver lawns: ~$150-200

Snow Removal

Professional snow removal for driveways, walkways, and sidewalks. Available for ad-hoc service.

Additional Cuts

Need extra cuts beyond your schedule? Season Pass customers get 25% off. Pay-per-visit customers pay standard rate.
